evidence.claim: Arden Home Health & Hospice utilizes AWS cloud services for data storage and application deployment.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance standards, ensuring secure handling of health information.
Arden employs RESTful APIs for integration with EHR systems.
HL7 and FHIR standards are implemented in their data exchange processes.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 for transaction processing, indicating API automation and clearinghouse needs.
